text: Juan Luciano Inostroza Tapia (27 December 1942 - 2 June 1989) was a Chilean fencer. He competed in the individual épée event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Chilean male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Chile Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics
title: Juan Inostroza
